120805.「……<pc>さん。\n 魂と 情熱と 心意気にあふれた\n すばらしい出来映え:
...<pc>. A wonderful piece of work,
full of soul, passion, and spirit...

120806.「あなたは 私が見込んだとおり\n 一流の職人に 成長してくれました。\n あり:
You have grown into the first-class craftsman
I had hoped you would be. Thank you...

120807.「いつまで 人を待たせるんだい！\n カンナっ！！:
How long are you going to keep people waiting,
Kanna?

120808.「ギルドマスターの 後釜が見つかったと\n アタシに連絡してきたのは アンタだろ:
It was you who informed me that you found a
replacement for the Guildmaster! Let's get
going!

120809.「ま 待ってください お母さん。\n 今は <pc>さんに\n 依頼した品の 鑑:
Wait a minute, Mother. I'm in the middle of
appraising an item I requested from
<pc>...

120811.「返してください！\n それは 大切な物なんですっ！:
Please give it back! That's a very important
thing!

120812.「ふん。それなら すぐに支度して\n この町の鉄道駅に 来るんだね。\n そうし:
Hmm. In that case, get ready and come to the
train station here in town right away. Then
I'll give it back to you.

120813.マスター・カンナの母 カナノコは\nカンナから <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>:
Guildmaster Kanna's mother Kananok left with
<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM> taken from Kanna...

120814.「……じつは 今回\n <pc>さんに 依頼したのは\n この私なんです。:
...Actually, it was I who requested
<pc> to do it this time.

120816.「２０歳になったら ギルドマスターをやめて\n 実家に帰る。それが 母との約束で:
When I turned 20, I would stop being a guildmaster and return to my parents' house. That was my promise to my mother. I intend to
leave this Woodworking Guild.

120817.「だから この依頼で 次のマスターにふさわしい\n ウデ前かどうか 確かめさせて:
So, with this request, I was able to see if
you are worthy of being the next master.
<pc>...the guild asked for it.

120818.「そんなっ！ カンナさんっ！？\n 考え直してくだせえっ！\n 実家に帰っちまう:
Kanna! Kanna! Please reconsider! I don't want
to go back to my parents' house!

120819.「……もう 決めたことですから。\n ただ 正式に <pc>さんが\n マスター:
I've already made my decision. However, in
order for <pc> to officially become
a master, he needs to be level liberated.

120820.「この町の鉄道駅で 母と待ち合わせしています。\n そこで 必ず <%sEV_S:
I am meeting my mother at the train station
here in town. So I must get <%sev_syok_item>
back and release the <pc> level.

120821.「……お手数をおかけしますが\n この町の 鉄道駅まで 来てください。\n 私の:
I apologize for the inconvenience, but please
come to the train station in this town. This
is my last request.

120822.「そろそろ 出発の時間だ。\n 乗り込むよ カンナ。: It's time to go. I'm getting in, Kanna.

120823.「待ってください お母さん。\n まだ <pc>さんが……:
Wait a minute, mother. I still
<pc>...

120826.「おやおや。職人どもの お出ましか。\n ボーフラみたいに どこにでも わいてく:
Well, well, well. The craftsmen are here.
They're like boffins, they're so annoying,
they come out of nowhere.

120827.「あの……お母さん。\n 駅に来たら <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>を\n 返:
Um...mom...you promised to return
<%sev_syok_item> when you came to train
station...?

120828.「はん。あの いまいちの出来で\n 趣味の悪い <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>:
Oh, no. You mean that poorly made and badly
tasteful <%sev_syok_item>. I threw it away
long ago because it was a burden.

120829.「今ごろ 風呂の たきつけにでも\n 使われてるんじゃないのかい？\n あの <:
I wonder if they're using him to give you a
bath now? That <%sev_syok_item> is a good fit.

120831.「<pc>が どれほど\n 魂をそそいで <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>を\n:
Do you have any idea how much soul work
<pc> put into creating
<%sev_syok_item>?

120832.「木工で作った品を 踏みにじるってことは\n 職人の魂を 踏みにじるのと 同じだ:
Trampling on a woodworker's work is the same
as trampling on a craftsman's soul! Even if
it's your mother, you can't allow it!

120833.「アンタとは もう 親でも子でもない！\n アタシは 家には 帰らないよっ！\n:
You and I are no longer parent and child! I'm
not going home! I'm going to stay in the
Woodworking Guild!

120834.「ご……ごめんなさい お母さんっ！！\n わ 私 つい カッとなって\n 失礼な: I'm sorry, Mother! I was upset and rude...

120835.「……その言葉が聞きたかったんだよ\n カンナ。: ...that's what I wanted to hear, Kanna.

120836.カナノコは <pc>の作った\n<%sEV_SYOK_ITEM>を\nカンナに:
Kananok returned <%sev_syok_item> created by
<pc> to Kanna!

120837.「アンタが いいかげんな気持ちで\n ギルドマスターを やってるなら\n 実家に:
If you had been a guildmaster with a good
heart, I would have taken you back to my
parents' house, but...

120838.「どうやら いらない心配だったようだ。\n 頼もしくなったね カンナ。:
It seems that it was an unnecessary worry.
You've become more reliable, Kanna.

120840.「カンナ。木工職人という アンタの花道を\n チカラいっぱい 歩いておゆき。\n:
Kanna, you're walking the path of a woodworker
with full of energy. ...Don't forget to show
your face at home once in a while.

120841.マスター・カンナの母親 カナノコは\n列車に乗りこむと\nひとり 帰っていった…:
Guildmaster Kanna's mother, Kananok, boarded
the train and left alone...

120842.<pc>と 木工ギルドの職人たちは\n大喜びで カンナを 木工ギルドへ連れて帰っ:
<pc> and the Woodworking Guild
craftsmen were overjoyed to take Kanna back to
the Woodworking Guild.

120843.「それにしても……\n 母は ずっと 私が木工職人になるのを\n 反対していたの:
But...my mother had always been against my
becoming a woodworker, so why all of a
sudden...?

120844.「よう お嬢。元気そうじゃの。\n この間は うちの若ぇモンが\n 借金の件で:
Hello, young lady. You look well. The other
day, our young man caused me a lot of trouble
with his debt.

120845.「そんなっ！ お気になさらないでください。\n おかげで キハダさんも\n 心を:
You are not a good person! Please don't worry
about it. Thanks to you, Kihada has changed
his mind...

120846.「お嬢の 懐の深さは\n スミツボのオヤジさん そっくりじゃな。\n ……恩に着:
Your daughter's generosity is just like her
father's in Sumipot. I'm in your debt.

120847.「ところで カナノコさんが\n 来とると聞いたけえ あいさつのひとつも\n した:
By the way, I heard that Mr. Kananok was here
and I wanted to say hello to him... but he's
not here already.

120848.「ツバクロさん。\n 母のこと ご存知なんですか！？: Ms. Tsubakuro. You know my mother?

120849.「そりゃぁ よう知っとる。\n 若い頃のカナノコさんは 毎日のように\n 木工ギ:
Well, how well do you know him? In his younger
days, Mr. Kananok used to come to the
Woodworking Guild every day.

120851.「……ほう そんなことが あったんか。: I didn't know such a thing had happened.

120852.「ええ。木工ギルドの仕事を続けていいと\n 許してくれたのは うれしいんですが\:
Yes, I'm happy that she allowed me to continue
working for the Woodworking Guild, but I don't
know how my mother feels...

120853.「カナノコさんはのう\n 昔 木工職人を 目指しとったんじゃよ。: Mr. Kananok used to aspire to be a woodworker.

120854.「じゃが 先代 スミツボのオヤジさんは\n えらく反対してなあ。カナノコさんは\:
However, Sumipot's father was against it so
much that Kananok gave up the idea of becoming
a woodworker.

120855.「今にして思えば かわいい娘に\n キツい仕事をさせたくなかったんじゃろうが\n:
In hindsight, he probably didn't want to put
his pretty daughter through too much hard
work, but... poor thing.

120857.「カナノコさんは 木工って仕事を\n 誰よりも 愛していたからこそ\n お嬢の本:
Mr. Kananok loved woodworking more than anyone
else, which is why he wanted to see his
daughter really get into it.

120858.「……ま ワシの勝手な想像じゃがのう。\n 本当のトコは お嬢が 自分で聞くがえ:
Well, it's just my imagination. I'll leave it
to the young lady to ask herself what the real
story is.

120861.「……私 もっと しっかりした\n 頼もしいギルドマスターになれるよう\n 精一:
I will do my best to become a more solid and
reliable guildmaster.

120862.「そして 祖父スミツボと 母カナノコの\n 木工にかける想いを\n 職人の皆さん:
And I would like to share my grandfather
Sumipot's and mother Kananok's passion for
woodworking with all the craftspeople...

120863.「だから <pc>さん。\n これからも 私と一緒に 木工ギルドを\n 盛り上げ:
So <pc>. Let's continue to make
Woodworking Guild exciting with me!
